screen_desc: This screenshot displays the search results for "Mercado Libre" in the Google Play Store. It lists various apps related to the Mercado Libre platform, such as "Novedades en Mercado Libre" and "Mercado Pago," with ratings, download counts, and categories like shopping and finance. At the bottom, there are recommended apps like Facebook, WhatsApp, and eBay. The user can filter the search results by rating, editors' choice, or premium.

click on the search bar located at the top left.
click on the search clear icon (indicated by an "X") located at the top right.
click on the "mercado libre" search result located at the top left.
